column5: Hi all,  It finally stopped snowing and the wind dropped below hurricane force so I took a few pics from my drone at sunrise.  I have a lot to learn and the pics are not my best but i'm still learning to fly it safely and have not got round to messing with camera settings or got used to taking well composed shots from a completely new perspective.  This drone is awesome, gonna make some cool videos this summer for sure.
beauty scenes. can't wait to see your  live action shots over the boat
great shots  of course if a plane ever landed near by or if there are animals in the forest  ah, never mind lol
LOL Terry... Simon was born with COMMON SENSE though !!  Great shots Mate !
Something tells me, there will be more boring videos on their way. LOL  Great shots Simon.
Awesome Simon! I cant wait to see your next vids! Looks like ice on the water still up there?

Nice pics  THANKS!    beauty scenes. can't wait to see your  live action shots over the boat  Hopefully soon Rick, if I don't get called to work today my plan is to have the boat ready by the end of the day! LOOKOUT CRAPPIE AND BASS!    Very nice !!!!!!  Thanks man!    great shots  of course if a plane ever landed near by or if there are animals in the forest  ah, never mind lol  I'm screwed, mosquitos are animals.   LOL Terry... Simon was born with COMMON SENSE though !!  Great shots Mate !  Thanks for the vote of confidence Wayne, you no doubt are very familiar with my new found perspective on the world!    Something tells me, there will be more boring videos on their way. LOL  Great shots Simon.  I'm gonna bore the heck outta ya....lol.    Awesome Simon! I cant wait to see your next vids! Looks like ice on the water still up there?   Thanks, we had ice out for a week then ICE IN...lol. Weather is settling now, no more ice till fall.
